price: Has there come to you the story of the adversaries, when they climbed the wall of his chamber?
arabic: ۞ وَهَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَصۡمِ إِذۡ تَسَوَّرُواْ ٱلۡمِحۡرَابَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
